Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

Today, I'm making something a little different. It's a VTOL! It's small! It's cute! It's... well... it's... see for yourself. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

~~~

Cute Mecha Dinosaur!

~~~

This tiny mechanical creature has loads of gimmicks. It can stand on its two hind feet, which was difficult enough to achieve. It has solar-panel 'wings' for a bit extra power (though the tail, made of RTGs, provides plenty of power as-is). It can VTOL and land safely with the help of some parachutes. Best of all, it looks nice and is rather part-light (79 parts).

I'm sure you want to see some pictures... so here we go.

**Pictures!**

![zFzcjyS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zFzcjyS.jpg)

*Here's the creature on the ground. Note the big eyes and the solar-panel wings.*

![NP8IvZD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NP8IvZD.jpg)

*Taking to the skies! RCS tanks give this craft close to a minute of flight time - not too impressive for a regular VTOL, but pretty neat for a dinosaur.*

![jvSgGVd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jvSgGVd.jpg)

*...and it's landed on the SPH after an uneventful journey.*

~~~

**Video!**

Give it a watch!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oRCeGJ_wcCs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

~~~

**Specs and Features!** 

Part Count: **79** (reasonable)

Mass: **2.3t** (also reasonable)

Size: **4.7x4.5x4.4m** (can fit within a Mk3 cargo bay)

Electric Charge: **605** (very high)

Monopropellant: **240** (reasonable)

Flight Time at Full Throttle: **0:29** (low-ish)

Flight Time at ~1 TWR: **0:50** (a bit better)

~~~

Docking Port: Check!

Emergency Safety Parachutes: Check!

Reasonable Handling: Check!

Light-Up Eyes: Check!

Solar Panel Wings: Check!

Adorableness: Well, I don't even have to answer this one.

~~~

.craft file:

[HERE!](https://www.dropbox.com/s/a792v8wf27b1jn2/Cute%20Widdle%20Dino.craft?dl=0)

It *only* costs 183,420 roots. Bargain-bin pricing, no? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

~~~

Thanks for taking a peek at this design! I hope you liked what you saw. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Upsilon

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-05T21:46:02Z" title="06/05/2015 09:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 5, 2015</time> by UpsilonAerospace**
LOL, good one man. Very cute.
Super cute. Hoping to try it out soon when .craft comes out. But it looks AWESOME! Just needs a flamethrower ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Add a command chair and it's Mecha-Yoshi. ;-)
That is so cute! I want one! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hello everyone! Thanks for the positive comments.

I think that rather than having a flamethrower, this little guy will just have two hidden RCS ports on its nose for a more gentle effect.

I love creating these small little things. **I'll probably create a video today or tomorrow, and the .craft file will be released along with said video.** So stay tuned!

-Upsilon
Well, it's different, I'll give you that... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Although it can't be classified as a dinosaur by science,(who even cares) SO CUTE!!!!!!!!
Awesome, pal, love it to bits!

Hi everyone!

~~~

**.craft file is out.** It's right [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/a792v8wf27b1jn2/Cute%20Widdle%20Dino.craft?dl=0).

It's labeled "Cute Widdle Dino." No, I couldn't think of anything else to call it. Sorry about its treacliness. ([That's totally a word](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/treacliness), by the way.)

The only thing out of the ordinary is that pressing the '1' action group toggles solar panels. It's probably best to fly this thing with caps lock on. Other than that, it's just your standard dinosaur. Nothing out of the ordinary. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

~~~

I also made a video!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oRCeGJ_wcCs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

~~~

So.

Enjoy your cute little dinosaur, and let me know what you think about it!

Oh, and I'll update the original post a little later. I'm currently in the middle of some work, and I just wanted to dash this post off quickly...

-Upsilon
